title: Strategic Instructional Design Workshop for Graduate Teaching Assistants

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theories and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Experience in primary/secondary science education settings with digital device capabilities

learning_goals: Participants can design and implement at least three effective teaching strategies tailored to science curricula within four weeks.
Participants can explain five core principles of classroom management through expert-led educational sessions.
Participants can conduct at least two mock lessons using developed instructional guides and incorporate feedback.
Participants can apply educational effectiveness evaluation tools to create action plans for improving their teaching.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
